title: I Am A TS Reincarnation, But I Have A Kid - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Gender Bender   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Adopted Children   Childcare   Cute Children   Female Protagonist   Male to Female   Modern Day   Transmigration
author: Chitu Bi   赤途碧
description:
One day, I was run over by truck-sama, and got reincarnated as a random woman.

The woman had a child, and I was to raise her.

You want a lunchbox? No, no, I’ll cook!

“I’m fine by the corner,” …Come here!

There’s something you want, but you can’t be selfish? Don’t worry, I’ll buy it for you with the money I worked for!

I don’t know what’s been going on with her, but I’m going to have to keep trying until she opens up her scared little girl’s mind!

No, really, my girl is too cute!

Hey, you kids, stay away from my daughter!>
